name: @indeks/react
description: React/Next.js wrapper for Indeks Core analytics

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:types
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.tsx --outdir dist/esm --format esm --target browser --external react --external react-dom --external @indeks/core
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.tsx --outdir dist/cjs --format cjs --target node --external react --external react-dom --external @indeks/core
